revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt Silver |image = [[File:Mt Silver.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Mt Silver |tokens = 10,000 |location = On the west end of Route 28 }} '''Mt Silver''' is a dungeon in [[Johto]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 130,500 |- | Boss || 440,000 |}
===Pokémon===
* Ponyta * Doduo * Tangela * Sneasel * Ursaring * Donphan * Teddiursa * Phanpy * Quagsire * Misdreavus * Larvitar (boss)
===Items===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | [[Lucky Egg]] || 50% |}
